mapper.select: SELECT * FROM drugstore WHERE drugstore_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR drugstore_addr_main LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR drugstore_addr_detail LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT dh.drugstore_history_id AS drugstore_history_id , m.member_name AS member_name , m.member_birth AS member_birth , m.member_tel AS member_tel , CASE WHEN dh.receive_type = 'W' THEN '직접수령' ELSE '택배수령' END AS receive_type , dh.status AS status , dh.remarks AS remarks FROM drugstore_history dh INNER JOIN members m ON dh.member_id = m.member_id INNER JOIN doctor d ON dh.doctor_id = d.doctor_id WHERE dh.drugstore_id = #{drugstoreId}
mapper.update: UPDATE drugstore_history SET remarks = #{remarks}, , status = "DY" WHERE drugstore_history_id = #{drugstoreHistoryId}

SELECT dh.*, m.member_birth, m.member_name, m.member_tel, CASE WHEN dh.receive_type = 'D' THEN '택배 수령' WHEN dh.receive_type = 'W' THEN '직접 수령' ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS receive_type_description, CASE WHEN dh.payment_status = 'N' THEN '미결제' WHEN dh.payment_status = 'Y' THEN '결제' ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS payment_status_description FROM drugstore_history dh INNER JOIN members m ON m.member_id = dh.member_id WHERE dh.status = 'DN' AND dh.drugstore_id = #{drugstoreId} ORDER BY dh.drugstore_history_id DESC LIMIT 3
